attributes.action: sack the entire health ministry over their handling of mtas and the recent private data leak
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the recent leaking of applicants most personal and private details, and the entire mtas fiasco, it is time for all those responsible to be removed from office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
